title: Strengthening Higher Education Accessibility through MOOC-Based Alternative Credential Pathways

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and comprehension of secondary-level language education
context.additional_context: As a corporate teacher training program, establishing a blended learning environment linked with MOOC platforms. Learners complete online modules using personal devices and conduct on-site application practices

learning_goals: Completing and obtaining certification for at least two higher education language courses via a MOOC platform
Analyzing ACE (American Council on Education) guidelines for alternative credential pathways and proposing implementation strategies
Developing instructional strategies that achieve over 80% educational effectiveness through formative assessment in blended learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
